name: Curse of the Spooky Ghost
description:
The game

Thanks for checking out my game ! This is a topdown adventure game, where your goal is to find a purple gem and to shatter it; but to be able to damage it, you first have to slay 30 skeletons. Sounds like a lot, huh ? Don't worry too much about this, you'll find a lot of them on your way.

However the graveyard containing the gem is cursed : as soon as you set foot on its evil ground, a totally spooky ghost will come to haunt and chase you !

The map opens up once you clear the opening area, so you'll have to explore the graveyard to find clues as to where that gem could be. Good luck !

Controls :

Arrow Keys - Move

X - Attack

F - Fullscreen

Credits

Game - TaliOS

Rain + thunder ambiance - https://opengameart.org/content/rain-and-thunders

Scream sound effect (when the player dies) - https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Pretty much everything else - Kenney, of course !

Thanks for playing !
